revised_title: A Comprehensive Study of Anthracosaurus russelli and the Anthracosauridae Family
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Paleobiology
tldr: This study provides a complete description of Anthracosaurus russelli Huxley, a Carboniferous amphibian, and its family Anthracosauridae. The research includes a reconstruction of the skull, analysis of the lower jaw, and examination of the postcranial skeleton. The author also discusses the provenance and classification of Eobaphetes kansensis Moody and proposes a new subfamily, Leptophractinae, within the Eogyrinidae family.
